column1: But the same year, 465, saw the biter bit : instead of forcing Athens to abandon an overseas operation to deal with a problem nearer home, that is, a Spartan army menacing the Attic border, Sparta was herself forced to welch on the Thasos offer, because she had to deal with a revolt of the helots at Ithome in Messenia.
